People's Daily People's Daily full text RSS. Get more full text RSS: https://feedx.net http://www.people.com.cn/ 01版要闻 - 习近平会见蒙古国总统呼日勒苏赫http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_1-01.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing with President Khürelsukh of Mongolia, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Huang Jingwen

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th  ; (Reporters Wen Wen, Chen Xu) On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with President Khürelsukh of Mongolia, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that Mongolia is a natural partner in jointly building the "Belt and Road" and one of the first countries to support the "Belt and Road" initiative. Over the past 10 years, the two sides have in-depth aligned their development strategies and achieved gratifying results in cooperation in trade and investment, connectivity, and people's livelihood projects. There is broad space for cooperation between the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" initiative and Mongolia's "Grassland Road" development strategy. It is hoped that Mongolia will rely on its geographical conditions connecting Europe and Asia to play a greater role in the high-quality joint construction of the "Belt and Road".

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that China is willing to work with Mongolia to adhere to mutual respect for independence, sovereignty and territorial integrity, support each other in safeguarding core interests, and build a solid foundation for a community with a shared future between the two countries. China will, as always, help Mongolia revitalize its economy, advance the construction of relevant ports in an orderly manner, and open up new channels for interconnection between the two countries. The China-Mongolia Cooperation Center for Desertification Prevention and Control has been established. China is willing to continue to support Mongolia’s “Planting a Billion Trees” plan and work together to build an ecological civilization. China is willing to expand trilateral cooperation between China, Mongolia and Russia and steadily promote the construction of the trilateral economic corridor.

;

;Khurelsukh expressed congratulations to China for successfully hosting the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. The results of this forum will help achieve the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals and will inject into world economic growth. New strong motivation. Mongolia regards developing relations with China as its primary foreign policy policy. Next year marks the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Mongolia and China, as well as the 10th anniversary of President Xi Jinping’s visit to Mongolia and the 10th anniversary of the establishment of a comprehensive strategic partnership between the two countries. Mongolia is willing to strengthen high-level exchanges with China, respect and support each other, promote cooperation in the fields of economy and trade, connectivity, mineral energy, desertification prevention and control, green development and other fields, and intensify people-to-people and cultural exchanges. Mongolia highly appreciates the important role China has played in world peace and stability, and supports the global development initiative, global security initiative and global civilization initiative proposed by President Xi Jinping. Mongolia attaches great importance to strengthening trilateral cooperation between Mongolia, China and Russia and is willing to work with China to intensify communication and coordination in multilateral fields.

;

;The two heads of state jointly witnessed the signing of a number of bilateral cooperation documents on cross-border railway, green and low-carbon, and digital economy.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi participated in the above activities.

;;
;

; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平会见刚果（布）总统萨苏http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_2-01.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the afternoon of October 19, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with President Sassouaux of the Republic of Congo, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Pang Xinglei

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th   (Reporter permission, Lin Miaomiao) On the afternoon of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with President Sassouaux of the Republic of Congo, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that Congo (Brazzaville) is an active participant and important partner in jointly building the “Belt and Road”. Both sides uphold the Silk Road spirit of peaceful cooperation, openness and inclusiveness, mutual learning, and mutual benefit, promote friendly cooperation, and achieve tangible results. The successful implementation of projects such as National Highway 1 in Congo-Brazzaville is a model. China and China are true friends and good partners. China cherishes the friendship between the two countries and is willing to strengthen practical cooperation with Congo within the framework of the "Belt and Road" and the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation, explore and cultivate cooperation growth points such as the digital economy and green development, and promote the continuous progress of China-Congo's comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership. Go to a new level.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that similar concepts, mutual trust, and mutual support are the magic weapons for the stable and long-term development of China-Congo relations. We thank Congo for its firm support to China on issues involving China’s core interests and major concerns. China supports Congo (Brazzaville) in safeguarding national independence and independence, opposing external interference, adhering to a development path that is consistent with its own national conditions, and supporting Congo (Brazzaville) in international and regional affairs. We are willing to work closely with Congo to promote the establishment of a more just and reasonable international order.

;

;Sassou said that the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" is a great project that provides the world with a new model of inclusive development. The third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum was a complete success, reflecting the firm support of the "Belt and Road" initiative by participating countries such as Congo (Brazzaville). China is a major contributor to world economic growth. Congo sincerely admires China's great achievements in development and is willing to work with China to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations next year as an opportunity to further develop Congo-China relations. Congo firmly adheres to the one-China policy and looks forward to continuing to support each other with China, strengthening practical cooperation in infrastructure, green energy and other fields, and intensifying communication and collaboration under the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation and other frameworks. Congo actively supports the global development initiative, global security initiative and global civilization initiative proposed by President Xi Jinping, and believes that the above important initiatives are conducive to safeguarding multilateralism and international fairness and justice.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平会见土库曼斯坦民族领袖、人民委员会主席别尔德穆哈梅多夫http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_3-01.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov, the national leader and Chairman of the People's Committee of Turkmenistan who came to China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Huang Jingwen

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th  ; (Reporters Wen Wen, Xia Ke) On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Turkmenistan’s national leader and Chairman of the People’s Committee Berd who was in China to attend the 3rd “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum Mukhamedov.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that China is Turkmenistan’s trustworthy friend and partner. In January this year, President Serdar Berdimuhamedov and I jointly announced that we would upgrade our relations to a comprehensive strategic partnership and implement a community of shared future at the bilateral level, opening a new chapter in the development of our relations. Developing China-Turkmenistan comprehensive strategic partnership is in line with the fundamental interests of both countries and is also the common expectation of the two peoples. China is willing to work with Turkey to continue to uphold the principles of mutual respect, mutual benefit and win-win results and promote the stability and long-term development of bilateral relations.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that mutual support is the core of a community with a shared future between China and Turkey. China appreciates that Turkey has always given China strong support on issues involving China's core interests and major concerns. We will continue to support Turkey in safeguarding national sovereignty, security, and development interests and pursuing a development path that is consistent with its national conditions. China is willing to work with Turkey to strengthen the strategic alignment between the “Belt and Road” initiative and the “Revival of the Silk Road” strategy, so as to turn the ancient Silk Road into a “road of happiness” in the new era. The two sides should increase the scale of trade between the two countries, expand cooperation in the fields of medical and health, sports, tourism and other fields, do a good job in holding mutual cultural year activities, and build the Luban Workshop on the ground as soon as possible. China is willing to work with Turkey to implement the outcomes of the China-Central Asia Summit and better promote cooperation in various fields.

;

;Germany Berdimukhamedov said that Turkey and China share a profound tradition of good neighborliness and their friendship has grown stronger over time. The ancient Silk Road connected the peoples of Turkey and China and promoted the progress of world civilization. Today, Turkmenistan's "Revival of the Silk Road" is closely aligned with China's "One Belt, One Road" initiative, which has greatly promoted the connectivity, development and revitalization of the two countries and regional countries. President Xi Jinping’s important speech at the opening ceremony of the third “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum pointed out the direction for future cooperation. The two sides should continue their friendship, pass on the brotherly relationship from generation to generation, always trust, understand and support each other, continue to deepen bilateral economic and energy cooperation and people-to-people and cultural exchanges, and communicate closely within multilateral mechanisms such as the China-Central Asia Mechanism. coordinate to promote the Turkey-China comprehensive strategic partnership to achieve more results, benefit the people of both countries, and make positive contributions to regional prosperity and development.

;

;The leaders of the two countries jointly witnessed the signing of economic and technological cooperation agreements and other bilateral cooperation documents.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi participated in the above activities.

;;

; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平会见埃及总理马德布利http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_4-01.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Egyptian Prime Minister Madbouly, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Shen Hong

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th  ; (Reporters Wen Wen, Zhang Xiao) On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Egyptian Prime Minister Madbouly, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that Egypt is the first Arab and African country to establish diplomatic relations with the People's Republic of China. China and Egypt are good friends who share the same goals and trust each other, and are also good partners who work together for development and common prosperity. Over the past 10 years, China and Egypt have carried out fruitful cooperation within the framework of jointly building the “Belt and Road”. China supports Egypt in pursuing a development path that suits its national conditions, is willing to deepen the docking of development strategies with Egypt, encourages powerful Chinese companies to invest and establish business in Egypt, and welcomes more high-quality Egyptian products to enter the Chinese market. China is willing to work with Egypt to implement the outcomes of the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum, strengthen cooperation in infrastructure, agricultural technology, renewable energy and other fields, expand people-to-people and cultural exchanges and cooperation, and continuously promote the development of China-Egypt comprehensive strategic partnership.

;

;Xi Jinping congratulated Egypt on being invited to join the BRICS cooperation mechanism, and pointed out that China is willing to strengthen cooperation with Egypt under the China-Arab and China-Africa frameworks, as well as coordinate and cooperate at the United Nations, BRICS and other multilateral platforms to maintain true Multilateralism safeguards international fairness and justice and the common interests of developing countries, and injects more certainty and stability into the region and the world.

;

;Madbouly expressed congratulations to China for successfully hosting the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. Egypt regards China as a role model for emerging economies and developing countries. Thanks to China for its long-term valuable support to Egypt. The joint construction of the “Belt and Road” has greatly improved Egypt’s transportation and logistics levels and effectively promoted Egypt’s economic development. Egypt expects Egypt-China relations to achieve greater development in various fields, is willing to continue to actively participate in the cooperation in building the "Belt and Road", and looks forward to more Chinese companies investing and operating in Egypt. Egypt is willing to provide policy support and security guarantees for this. We thank China for supporting Egypt in joining the BRICS cooperation mechanism and are willing to work closely with China on multilateral collaboration to promote a more balanced and just international landscape.

;

;Xi Jinping clarified China's principled position on the current situation between Palestine and Israel, emphasizing that the top priority is to cease fire and end the war as soon as possible to avoid the conflict from expanding or even getting out of control and causing a serious humanitarian crisis. The fundamental way out to resolve the recurring conflict between Palestine and Israel is to implement the "two-state solution", establish an independent Palestinian state, and achieve peaceful coexistence between Palestine and Israel. China appreciates Egypt's important role in cooling the situation, supports Egypt's efforts to open a humanitarian corridor, and is willing to strengthen coordination with Egypt and Arab countries to promote an early comprehensive, just and lasting solution to the Palestinian issue. Madbouly said that Egypt and Arab countries highly appreciate China's consistent and just stance on the Palestinian issue and look forward to China playing a greater role in resolving the current crisis.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平会见柬埔寨首相洪玛奈http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_5-01.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Cambodian Prime Minister Hun Manai who was in China to attend the 3rd "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Huang Jingwen

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th  ; (Reporters Wen Wen, Ji Ning) On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Prime Minister Hun Manai of Cambodia, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that since the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Cambodia 65 years ago, the two countries have respected, trusted, supported and achieved each other, setting an example for countries large and small to treat each other as equals and achieve mutual benefit and win-win results. Both China and Cambodia are countries that value friendship, and the iron-clad friendship between China and Cambodia is unbreakable. The two sides should frequent frequent visits, maintain high-level strategic communication, make good use of the intergovernmental coordination committee mechanism between the two countries, implement the action plan for building a China-Cambodia community with a shared future in the new era, and promote China-Cambodia relations to get better and better.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” has brought real development opportunities to Cambodia. China is willing to uphold the principle of extensive consultation, joint contribution and shared benefits, promote the integration of the "Belt and Road" initiative with Cambodia's "Pentagonal Strategy", accelerate the enrichment of the "Diamond Six-sided" cooperation structure between China and Cambodia, and build the "Industrial Development Corridor" and the "Fish and Rice Corridor". Promote more projects to benefit the people. China supports projects such as the Cambodian airport and the restoration of cultural relics and historic sites, welcomes more Cambodian agricultural products to enter the Chinese market, and encourages more Chinese tourists to travel to Cambodia. I would like to join you in announcing that 2024 will be designated as the "Year of People-to-People Exchanges between China and Cambodia".

;

;Hong Manai said that yesterday I listened carefully to President Xi Jinping’s keynote speech at the opening ceremony of the third “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum. President Xi’s speech demonstrated strategic vision and proposed major Practical measures will surely lead to greater success in jointly building the "Belt and Road", and the Cambodian side speaks highly of this and warmly congratulates it. Thanks to China for its long-term valuable support to Cambodia. Cambodia firmly pursues friendly policies towards China and firmly supports China’s core interests. It is willing to take the opportunity of celebrating the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Cambodia and China to strengthen exchanges and cooperation with China, promote cooperation in the “Industrial Development Corridor” and the “Fish and Rice Corridor”, and build a shared future for Cambodia and China. community. More Chinese tourists are welcome to travel to Cambodia. The series of important initiatives put forward by President Xi Jinping provide important opportunities and platforms for world peace and development, and Cambodia actively supports them.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;;

; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平会见泰国总理赛塔http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_6-01.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the afternoon of October 19, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Thai Prime Minister Saitha Thakur, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum and pay an official visit.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Huang Jingwen

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th  ; (Reporter permission, Luo Xin) On the afternoon of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Thai Prime Minister Saitha Thakur, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum and pay an official visit.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that Prime Minister Saitha Thakkar made China the first country outside ASEAN to officially visit, which fully reflects the great importance that the new Thai government attaches to China-Thailand relations. China and Thailand live next to each other, and China-Thailand friendship is deeply rooted in the hearts of the two peoples. I am glad that the results of my visit to Thailand last November are being actively and effectively implemented. China is willing to work with Thailand to continuously give "China and Thailand are one family" new connotations of the times and transform the advantages of the traditional friendship between the two countries into the driving force for win-win cooperation.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that China supports Thailand in taking a development path that is in line with its own national conditions, and the two sides must continue to provide each other with firm support on issues involving each other's core interests and major concerns. China and Thailand should spearhead the high-quality Belt and Road Initiative, accelerate the construction of the China-Thailand railway, expand cooperation in digital economy, green development, new energy and other fields, and expand people-to-people and cultural exchanges. Both sides should step up efforts to crack down on cross-border crimes such as telecommunications fraud and online gambling to create a safe environment for the development of both countries. China is willing to strengthen cooperation with Thailand within multilateral frameworks such as ASEAN, Lancang-Mekong Cooperation and the United Nations, share the opportunities of China's large market and high-level opening up, inject positive energy into the development of Asia, and make positive contributions to promoting the reform of global governance.

;

;Saita expressed congratulations on the 10th anniversary of the "Belt and Road" initiative and the successful holding of the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. I sincerely admire President Xi Jinping’s foresight and China’s achievements in poverty reduction, and am willing to learn from China’s experience in governance. Thailand will conscientiously implement the important results of President Xi Jinping’s visit to Thailand last November and work with China to build a more stable, more prosperous and more sustainable Thailand-China community with a shared future. Taiwan is an integral part of China's territory. Thailand respects China's core interests and firmly adheres to the one-China principle. It is hoped that the two sides will deepen practical cooperation in various fields, jointly build the Thailand-China Railway, and promote the development concept of China-Laos-Thailand Connect. Thailand will make every effort to ensure the safety of Chinese citizens in Thailand and welcomes more Chinese companies to invest in Thailand and more Chinese citizens to travel to Thailand.

;

;The two sides issued a "Joint Press Communique between the Government of the People's Republic of China and the Royal Government of Thailand".

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平会见莫桑比克总理马莱阿内http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_7-01.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the evening of October 19, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Prime Minister Maleane of Mozambique, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Yin Bogu

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th  ; (Journalist permission, Ji Ning) On the evening of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Prime Minister Maleane of Mozambique, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that China and Mozambique are true friends and true brothers who share weal and woe and share weal and woe. I am happy to see that China-Mozambique cooperation in jointly building the “Belt and Road” has achieved fruitful results. China is willing to work with Mozambique and other African countries to build the "Belt and Road" with high quality, promote the implementation of the three cooperation initiatives of "Supporting African Industrialization Initiative", "China's Plan to Assist African Agricultural Modernization" and "China-Africa Talent Training Cooperation Plan", and strengthen policies Docking and cooperative planning, sharing development opportunities and development results, and helping African countries accelerate their modernization process.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that China is willing to work with Mozambique to continuously deepen the traditional friendship between China and Mozambique, strengthen strategic coordination, and promote the continuous new development of the China-Mozambique comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership. China supports Mozambique in safeguarding national sovereignty, security and development interests and pursuing a development path that suits its national conditions. The two sides should deepen cooperation in energy, agriculture and other fields, and promote education, culture, local and people-to-people exchanges. China is willing to strengthen communication with Mozambique at the United Nations and other multilateral platforms to promote the implementation of global development initiatives, global security initiatives, and global civilization initiatives.

;

;Maleane said that he was very happy to come to China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. This trip deepened our understanding of China and the Belt and Road Initiative, and gave us a better appreciation of President Xi Jinping’s strategic vision. A series of important initiatives such as the "Belt and Road" initiative and the Global Development Initiative are conducive to helping other countries eliminate poverty, develop their economies, and improve people's livelihood. China's development and foreign policies are based on peace, equality, respect and friendship, and are positive energy that promotes world peace and development. Whether during Mozambique's struggle for national independence or during the difficult period of the COVID-19 epidemic, China has always given Mozambique firm support and is a true friend of Mozambique. Mozambique firmly adheres to the one-China policy and hopes to learn from the experience of Chinese-style modernization to better achieve its own development, deepen practical cooperation with China in various fields, and promote the building of a community with a shared future for mankind.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平会见巴基斯坦总理卡卡尔http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_8-01.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the evening of October 19, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Pakistani Prime Minister Kakkar, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Huang Jingwen

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th  ; (Reporter permission, Chen Xu) On the evening of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Pakistani Prime Minister Kakkar, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that China and Pakistan are all-weather strategic partners and iron friends, and successive Pakistani governments have actively supported and participated in the "Belt and Road" cooperation. Over the past 10 years, the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor has achieved fruitful results, effectively promoted Pakistan's economic and social development, and has become an important landmark project in the joint construction of the "Belt and Road". China is willing to carry forward traditional friendship with Pakistan, deepen mutually beneficial cooperation, and accelerate the building of a closer China-Pakistan community with a shared future in the new era.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that China appreciates Pakistan's long-term firm support for China's core interests, will continue to support Pakistan in safeguarding national sovereignty, independence and territorial integrity, and supports Pakistan in independently choosing a development path that is in line with its national conditions. The two sides should take this year's 10th anniversary of the construction of the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor as an opportunity to create an "upgraded version" of the corridor with growth, people's livelihood, innovation, green and openness, strengthen cooperation in industrial parks, agriculture, mining, new energy and other fields, and promote major interconnection projects as soon as possible. It has been implemented and achieved practical results, and more Pakistani high-quality agricultural products are welcome to be exported to China. It is hoped that Pakistan will ensure the safety of Chinese institutions and personnel in Pakistan. China is willing to strengthen cooperation with Brazil within the framework of the United Nations and the Shanghai Cooperation Organization, promote regional unity and cooperation, and safeguard the legitimate interests of developing countries.

;

;Kakkar expressed congratulations on the great success of the "One Belt, One Road" initiative in the past 10 years. President Xi Jinping’s speech at the opening ceremony of the third “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum was very profound and far-sighted. The eight actions proposed by President Xi will not only strengthen world connectivity, but also promote a more fair and reasonable global governance system, providing important opportunities for Pakistan and other countries to achieve better development. The successful practice of Chinese-style modernization has set an example and provided motivation for other developing countries. China promotes the building of a community with a shared future for mankind, bringing confidence and hope to other countries. Pakistan firmly adheres to the one-China principle and stands firmly with China on issues involving China's core interests. This is Pakistan's cross-party consensus. Pakistan will always be a trustworthy and reliable friend of China, will never allow any force to undermine the friendship between Pakistan and China, and will continue to be committed to deepening the all-weather strategic cooperative partnership between Pakistan and China. Pakistan is willing to cooperate closely with China to promote the high-quality development of the Pakistan-China Economic Corridor. The Pakistani government will make every effort to protect the safety and interests of Chinese citizens and institutions in Pakistan.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;;
;
;

;;https:// feedx.best;

; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平会见新开发银行行长罗塞夫http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_9-01.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the evening of October 19, President Xi Jinping Met with New Development Bank President Rousseff at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Yin Bogu

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th  ; (Reporter permission, Zhang Xiao) On the evening of October 19, President Xi Jinping met with President of the New Development Bank Rousseff at the Great Hall of the People.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that in 2014, we jointly witnessed the birth of the New Development Bank in Brazil. In recent years, the New Development Bank has made remarkable achievements and continues to grow and develop. At present, various risks and crises in the world are intertwined and superimposed. As an important emerging force in the international financial system, the New Development Bank should play its due role and become a new multilateral development institution in the 21st century, promote the development of the international financial system in a more fair and reasonable direction, and effectively enhance the representation of emerging markets and developing countries. Sex and voice. The New Development Bank is welcome to participate in the “One Belt, One Road” initiative and global development initiatives to help implement the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development and help more developing countries achieve modernization. China will continue to support the work of the New Development Bank and provide support for you to perform your duties in China.

;

;Rosseff said that she was very pleased to participate in the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. Under the current international situation, countries around the world need to take joint actions to deal with common challenges. Strengthening infrastructure construction and interconnection is crucial for developing countries to achieve common development. There has never been any initiative in history that can bring more than 150 countries together like the Belt and Road Initiative. The “Belt and Road” initiative and this summit forum will play an important role in global sustainable development and green development. Thank you to the Chinese government for its strong support of the work of the New Development Bank. The New Development Bank is very consistent with the purposes and concepts of the "Belt and Road" initiative and is willing to actively participate in the cooperation in building the "Belt and Road" and make due contributions to promoting world multipolarity and the reform of the international financial system.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800 02版要闻 - 习近平会见土库曼斯坦民族领袖、人民委员会主席别尔德穆哈梅多夫http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_1-02.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov, the national leader and Chairman of the People's Committee of Turkmenistan who came to China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Huang Jingwen

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th  ; (Reporters Wen Wen, Xia Ke) On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Turkmenistan’s national leader and Chairman of the People’s Committee Berd who was in China to attend the 3rd “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum Mukhamedov.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that China is Turkmenistan’s trustworthy friend and partner. In January this year, President Serdar Berdimuhamedov and I jointly announced that we would upgrade our relations to a comprehensive strategic partnership and implement a community of shared future at the bilateral level, opening a new chapter in the development of our relations. Developing China-Turkmenistan comprehensive strategic partnership is in line with the fundamental interests of both countries and is also the common expectation of the two peoples. China is willing to work with Turkey to continue to uphold the principles of mutual respect, mutual benefit and win-win results and promote the stability and long-term development of bilateral relations.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that mutual support is the core of a community with a shared future between China and Turkey. China appreciates that Turkey has always given China strong support on issues involving China's core interests and major concerns. We will continue to support Turkey in safeguarding national sovereignty, security, and development interests and pursuing a development path that is consistent with its national conditions. China is willing to work with Turkey to strengthen the strategic alignment between the “Belt and Road” initiative and the “Revival of the Silk Road” strategy, so as to turn the ancient Silk Road into a “road of happiness” in the new era. The two sides should increase the scale of trade between the two countries, expand cooperation in the fields of medical and health, sports, tourism and other fields, do a good job in holding mutual cultural year activities, and build the Luban Workshop on the ground as soon as possible. China is willing to work with Turkey to implement the outcomes of the China-Central Asia Summit and better promote cooperation in various fields.

;

;Germany Berdimukhamedov said that Turkey and China share a profound tradition of good neighborliness and their friendship has grown stronger over time. The ancient Silk Road connected the peoples of Turkey and China and promoted the progress of world civilization. Today, Turkmenistan's "Revival of the Silk Road" is closely aligned with China's "One Belt, One Road" initiative, which has greatly promoted the connectivity, development and revitalization of the two countries and regional countries. President Xi Jinping’s important speech at the opening ceremony of the third “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum pointed out the direction for future cooperation. The two sides should continue their friendship, pass on the brotherly relationship from generation to generation, always trust, understand and support each other, continue to deepen bilateral economic and energy cooperation and people-to-people and cultural exchanges, and communicate closely within multilateral mechanisms such as the China-Central Asia Mechanism. coordinate to promote the Turkey-China comprehensive strategic partnership to achieve more results, benefit the people of both countries, and make positive contributions to regional prosperity and development.

;

;The leaders of the two countries jointly witnessed the signing of economic and technological cooperation agreements and other bilateral cooperation documents.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi participated in the above activities.

;; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800 02版要闻 - 习近平会见埃及总理马德布利http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231020_2-02.htm
;Friday, October 20, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping The Great Hall of the People in Beijing met with Egyptian Prime Minister Madbouly, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Shen Hong

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 19th  ; (Reporters Wen Wen, Zhang Xiao) On the morning of October 19, President Xi Jinping met at the Great Hall of the People with Egyptian Prime Minister Madbouly, who was in China to attend the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that Egypt is the first Arab and African country to establish diplomatic relations with the People's Republic of China. China and Egypt are good friends who share the same goals and trust each other, and are also good partners who work together for development and common prosperity. Over the past 10 years, China and Egypt have carried out fruitful cooperation within the framework of jointly building the “Belt and Road”. China supports Egypt in pursuing a development path that suits its national conditions, is willing to deepen the docking of development strategies with Egypt, encourages powerful Chinese companies to invest and start business in Egypt, and welcomes more high-quality Egyptian products to enter the Chinese market. China is willing to work with Egypt to implement the outcomes of the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum, strengthen cooperation in infrastructure, agricultural technology, renewable energy and other fields, expand people-to-people exchanges and cooperation, and continuously promote the development of China-Egypt comprehensive strategic partnership.

;

;Xi Jinping congratulated Egypt on being invited to join the BRICS cooperation mechanism, and pointed out that China is willing to strengthen cooperation with Egypt under the China-Arab and China-Africa frameworks, as well as coordinate and cooperate at the United Nations, BRICS and other multilateral platforms to maintain true Multilateralism safeguards international fairness and justice and the common interests of developing countries, and injects more certainty and stability into the region and the world.

;

;Madbouly expressed congratulations to China for successfully hosting the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. Egypt regards China as a role model for emerging economies and developing countries. Thanks to China for its long-term valuable support to Egypt. The joint construction of the “Belt and Road” has greatly improved Egypt’s transportation and logistics levels and effectively promoted Egypt’s economic development. Egypt expects Egypt-China relations to achieve greater development in various fields, is willing to continue to actively participate in the cooperation in building the "Belt and Road", and looks forward to more Chinese companies investing and operating in Egypt. Egypt is willing to provide policy support and security guarantees for this. We thank China for supporting Egypt in joining the BRICS cooperation mechanism and are willing to work closely with China on multilateral collaboration to promote a more balanced and just international landscape.

;

;Xi Jinping clarified China’s principled position on the current situation between Palestine and Israel, emphasizing that the top priority is to cease fire and end the war as soon as possible to avoid the conflict from expanding or even getting out of control and causing a serious humanitarian crisis.解决巴以冲突循环往复的根本出路是落实“两国方案”，建立独立的巴勒斯坦国，实现巴以双方和平共处。中方赞赏埃及为推动局势降温发挥的重要作用，支持埃及开辟人道主义走廊的努力，愿同埃及和阿拉伯国家加强协调，推动早日全面、公正、持久解决巴勒斯坦问题。马德布利表示，埃及和阿拉伯国家高度赞赏中方在巴勒斯坦问题上一贯秉持公正立场，期待中方为解决当前危机发挥更大作用。

;

;蔡奇、王毅参加会见。

;; Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:56:04 +0800
